name: xmstopn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: simprbi(wcel(c0, cxms), wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2)), wcel(c0, ctps))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cxms), wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cxms), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cxms), wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cxms), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cxms), wa(wcel(c0, ctps), wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c3, c3)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ *MetSp ↔(c0 ∈ TopSp ∧ c1 =(MetOpen ` c2)))
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =((dist ` c0)|`(c3 × c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cxms), wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c3, c3)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ *MetSp → c1 =(MetOpen ` c2))
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =((dist ` c0)|`(c3 × c3))

comment: The topology component of an extended metric space coincides with the topology generated by the metric component. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
